verbs.description: [ARG0: South Korean President Moon Jae - in] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] [ARG1: that US President Donald Trump would be a worthy winner of the Nobel Peace Prize for his involvement in the warming of relations with North Korea] .

South Korean President Moon Jae - in said Monday that US President Donald Trump [V: would] be a worthy winner of the Nobel Peace Prize for his involvement in the warming of relations with North Korea .

South Korean President Moon Jae - in said Monday that [ARG1: US President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: be] [ARG2: a worthy winner of the Nobel Peace Prize] [ARGM-CAU: for his involvement in the warming of relations with North Korea] .
